reviewText: This is a fun disc which brings to life some of the great strips.  The artwork isn't the greatest but remains true to the strip.  The color is good and the voicing is fine. Snoopy, thankfully, is not heard but gets to "comment" in print-balloons. I would welcome another volume.
Though some actions are in a sense repeats from other shows Charlie Brown motion comics are always good in my opinion.
Wonderful entertainment and movie with all of the Peanut characters for all
Watch it in higher quality here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yf26dS-AenI
Wonderful addition to my Peanuts collection!  I enjoyed it very much!
Item was as described and arrived promptly
i enjoy evert thing Peanuts. the storys tell of life like chiled experiences. it keeps me laughen. and the music is great.

This is a burn-on-demand DVD but it might work with DVD players.

Back cover description:
It's Something New Charlie Brown!
Good grief! Our comic strips have motion! Classic, syndicated Peanuts funny-pages strips from back in the day are now available for a new generation of fans to discover with this 20-Episode Motion Comics Collection of revamped Charles M. Schulz creations featuring voices, color, sound effects and music. Good ol' Charlie Brown, Snoopy, Lucy, Linus and more of the Peanuts kids are here in vignettes filled with humor, heart and happiness. From football follies to baseball games, from Lucy's advice (that'll be $143, please) to Charlie Brown's pondering about happiness, from the mysterious Great Pumpkin to Valentine yearnings, one iconic moment after another is here. Join the fun!

Episodes Include:
I'm New at It
A Fall Rain
The Good Brother
Services Rendered
Some Advice
Linus for President
The Elections
Eraserophagia
Dear Great Pumpkin
Valentine's Crush
The Sore Arm
Ready To Pitch
All Your Faults
Back On the Mound
Independence Day
Science Project
Dear Santa Claus
Crabby Little Girl
April's Fool
Mother's Day

That's all.

This DVD only had 1 title on it and it skipped; most of the DVD wasn't even there.  It was a total waste of money. I had purchased as a Christmas gift and was outside the 30 day period to return so I had to eat the loss.
Good collection for Peanuts fans. A must have for your collection. Had good episodes, and some never seen before. Definite good buy
